item.description:
$9 Lift Tickets on Friday!

Join us for Ticket Roll Back Day this Friday, January 6 at Cranmore Mountain, when lift tickets are only $9 for all ages!

 

Hi! Everyone we are teaming up with Boston Ski for this event.  If anyone is interested in staying at SkiDads in Bartlett for the night or the weekend, the price is $20 per night.  Dinner on Saturday night is $10.

If you are planning on staying over night we need your RSVP by midnight on Wednesday Jan 4th. When replying to this meetup please answer the questions accordingly so we know if you are meeting us @ Cranmore for the day or if you would like to spend the weekend. Click here to RSVP for lodging:

http://www.meetup.com/Bostonskimeetup/events/46231482/

For those that stay there are lift tickets available on Saturday for Bretton Woods @ $45 or if ski conditions are not that good I may be organizing a moderate hike. Please be sure to bring winter hiking clothing and gear ie: crampons..

Click here to buy your lift tickets in advance @ Cranmore:

https://store.cranmore.com/e-commerce/itemShow.aspx?Dep=P0kb3npcSO1zQ+R1g6Rqbw==&Cat=shaGGc8VZu23xv/P0N1Piw==&It=tdFfAKYliTthke5lAiHtQA==

Hope to see many of you on Friday!
item.name: Ticket Roll back Day @ Cranmore on Friday
